channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenText -- NetIQ Directory and Resource Administrator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenText -- NetIQ Directory and Resource Administrator

item.title: CVE-2020-25836|2024-08-04T15:40:37.000Z -- opentext -- netiq%20directory%20and%20resource%20administrator
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Access vulnerability in OpenText NetIQ Directory and Resource Administrator. This issue affects NetIQ Directory and Resource Administrator versions prior to 10.0.2 and prior to 9.2.1 Patch 10.

item.title: CVE-2020-25836|2024-07-16T21:38:15.638Z -- opentext -- netiq%20directory%20and%20resource%20administrator
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Access vulnerability in OpenText NetIQ Directory and Resource Administrator. This issue affects NetIQ Directory and Resource Administrator versions prior to 10.0.2 and prior to 9.2.1 Patch 10.
